lines.text: The Boss always says, "Women's business is nothing but wind. Men's business, no matter how small, is important."
Do you think I've been twiddling my thumbs since we got here?

[to Song]
Just because you fucked me you think you're the boss?

[to Shuisheng]
All the kids in our family want to come here to get rich, but you're the only one I recommended. Don't let me down.
You know the rule - your ass is your own, but if you get fondled in here, the money is mine.
